scoring.engine.polling package¶

Submodules¶

scoring.engine.polling.poll_dns module¶

class scoring.engine.polling.poll_dns.DnsPollInput(record_type, query, server=None, port=None)[source]¶

Bases: scoring.engine.polling.poller.PollInput

Wrapper for the inputs to a DnsPoller.

record_type¶

str – DNS record type to query for.

query¶

str – Query string to send to server.

server¶

str, optional – IP or FQDN of a DNS server to query.

class scoring.engine.polling.poll_dns.DnsPollResult(answer, exception=None)[source]¶

Bases: scoring.engine.polling.poller.PollResult

Wrapper for the results of polling a DNS service.

answer¶

dns.resolver.Answer – DNS query answer. None if there was an error.

exceptions¶

Exception – Exceptions raised in polling, if any. None if there was no error.

class scoring.engine.polling.poll_dns.DnsPoller[source]¶

Bases: scoring.engine.polling.poller.Poller

A Poller for DNS services.

This Poller uses a DNS stub resolver to perform DNS queries against a server.

poll(poll_input)[source]¶

Poll a service and return a PollResult.

Parameters:poll_input (PollInput) – Input used to interact with the service.
Returns:Results of polling the service
Return type:PollResult

scoring.engine.polling.poll_ftp module¶

class scoring.engine.polling.poll_ftp.FtpPollInput(filepath, server=None, port=None)[source]¶

Bases: scoring.engine.polling.poller.PollInput

Wrapper for the inputs to a FtpPoller.

filepath¶

str – Path of file to get

class scoring.engine.polling.poll_ftp.FtpPollResult(file_contents, exceptions)[source]¶

Bases: scoring.engine.polling.poller.PollResult

Wrapper for the results of polling an FTP service.

file¶

file handle – File retrieved. None if there was an error.

exceptions¶

Exception – Exceptions raised in polling, if any. None if there was no error.

scoring.engine.polling.poll_log module¶

class scoring.engine.polling.poll_log.LogPollInput(log_file, time_period, server=None, port=None)[source]¶

Bases: scoring.engine.polling.poller.PollInput

Wrapper for the inputs to a LogPoller.

log_file¶

str – Log file to search.

time_period¶

int – The amount of time (in seconds) before the time of check to include in the log search.

class scoring.engine.polling.poll_log.LogPollResult(contents, exception=None)[source]¶

Bases: scoring.engine.polling.poller.PollResult

Wrapper for the results of polling a log file.

contents¶

str – Contents of the log file in the given time range.

exceptions¶

Exception – Exceptions raised in polling, if any. None if there was no error.

class scoring.engine.polling.poll_log.LogPoller[source]¶

Bases: scoring.engine.polling.poller.Poller

A Poller for log files.

This Poller searches a log file and returns the logs for a given period of time.

Logs are expected to be of the form: yyyy-mm-dd HH:MM:SS|log values

poll(poll_input)[source]¶

scoring.engine.polling.poller module¶

class scoring.engine.polling.poller.PollInput(server=None, port=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

Wrapper for the inputs to a Poller.

This should be subclassed for each subclass of Poller.

server¶

str, optional – IP address or FQDN of a service to poll

port¶

int, optional – Port of the service to poll

attrs()[source]¶
serialize(obj)[source]¶
class scoring.engine.polling.poller.PollResult(exception)[source]¶

Bases: object

Wrapper for the results of polling a service.

This should be sublcassed for every subclass of Poller.
